sentences.en: all the Bonapartes were banished from France in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 所有波拿巴家族的人都被永远逐出法国。

sentences.en: And should the money be paid in perpetuity?
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是不是该永久支付.

sentences.en: He bequeathed to Makhan, in perpetuity , his fishing - rod, his big kite and his marbles.
sentences.cn: 他将他的鱼竿 、 大风筝和弹珠一并永久性送给马克汉.

sentences.en: If the payments are madean infinite period of time the annuity is called a perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 假如支付期是无限的,称为永久年金.

sentences.en: The land had been promised to the Indian tribes in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 这片土地已经被允诺永久归印第安各部落所有。

sentences.en: The land was given to him in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 这土地永远归他所有了.

sentences.en: The land was given to them in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 这块土地永久地给他伴随.

sentences.en: The perpetuity of the Church was an article of faith ( Morris L. West )
sentences.cn: 教会的永恒是一种信仰的契约 ( 莫里斯L. 韦斯特 )

sentences.en: The years may look like the fallen leaf to flutter equally pass, but this wealth perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 岁月尽可以象落叶一样飘逝, 但这笔财富永存.

sentences.en: These lands were granted to our family in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 这些土地依法永远归我们家族所有.

sentences.en: They do not own the land in perpetuity.
sentences.cn: 他们并不是永久拥有这片土地.

phrases.tran_cn: 永远：持续一个无限期的时间段；永远
